name: Audiobatics
description:
Time your jumps to the song and get to the end! Only the best will survive. Can you make it?

Disclaimer: At this stage of development this game is far from finished. If you've found a bug or anything worth mentioning take a look at To Do List.txt file that's zipped along with the game to see whether I know about that thing or not. And feel free to contact me about any suggestions/other. Thanks!
